title: LeadLake
description: LeadLake is an AI-powered B2B prospecting platform that automates outreach. It gathers detailed local business data, including emails, phone numbers, Google reviews, and ad pixel usage. It also detects marketing software, CMS platforms, and tech stacks.  Our AI Studio integrates with major language models, enabling users to generate hyper-personalized messages at scale using the data our browsing agent scrapes. Users can import these emails into any email platform to start sending immediately.
